body:
Comment 1: 
It uses /usr/local in case the $GOBIN is not on
local disk and thus mounted nosuid.

You are not required to run sudo.bash.
The print that tells you about it says
'Read and run', not just 'run', precisely
so that you can decide whether it is
appropriate for your system or not.

Russ
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
